title: how do I can get the orange essences in the game ?
body:
I have been playing since yesterday and today i got the second box, also play and get the 3 keys to open the box. When I open the box they say that i can craft ssw talon and i need more orange essences and idk how to get it. (sorry for my English still improving playing lol ) xd 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body:
The easiest way to get orange essence is to disenchant skin shards that you know you don't want.  The amount each skin shard disenchants into is listed when you click on the shard.

Hope that helps!

Hey Hollymonster,  I just needed your opinion on whether I should disenchant or save the shards for rerolls. Cause I got Rumble in the Jungle skin shard, but I don't own him and I don't really plan on getting him in the next 3 or 4 years, so is it better to disenchant the shard or save it for a reroll?
As it stands, you should save up to reroll. If you find yourself out of orange essence, then you can break down when needed.

This!

I would personally wait to break anything down until you find something you really want to upgrade.  The shards don't go anywhere until you use them, so you don't need to worry about them expiring or anything.
Do they go away after season ends, or when another starts? Because the champs you got chests for reset...

Since its Rumble who is a 4800IP champ you should disenchant because if you reroll, theres a 50% chance to get a 3150IP champ and under that will be even less orange essence than rumle, and you will have more orange essence to use for the skins/champs you actually care about.

In the top left corner the amount of essence you get for disenchanting is there, just click on the shard you **don't want** and click the disenchant, it will have a green number showing the amount of orange essence you will get. It's the second option from the top.
